MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G3 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Carnarvon Street. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:19pm on Friday, 19 February 2021
